entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
